forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain this morning. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
